product_name: Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat offers sun coverage on the trail with lightweight, breathable nylon fabric and mesh panels for ventilation. Wrinkle-resistant, quick-drying fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Closed-cell foam brim allows hat to float; dark color under brim reduces glare. CoolMax(R) sweatband wicks moisture away for comfort. Mesh sides allow cooling airflow to keep you comfortable on hot days. Dark color on the underside of the brim helps reduce glare in your eyes on sunny days. Closeout.
short_description: The Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat offers sun coverage on the trail with lightweight, breathable nylon fabric and mesh panels for ventilation.
